data.title: Lightning Strikes Twice (1934 film)

company

Distributed byRKO Radio Pictures

Release date

Running time

66 minutesCountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish

Lightning Strikes Twice is a 1934 American comedy film directed by Ben Holmes from a screenplay by Joseph A. Fields and John Grey. It stars Ben Lyon, Thelma Todd, and Pert Kelton. A print is held by the Library of Congress.[2]

[edit]
